original_title: No es bueno que el hombre esté solo
overview: Martín is a tormented and solitary man who hides a shameful and unspeakable secret: he lives with a life-size doll which he treats as if it were his wife. This idyliic, loving existence will be gravely threatened when a prostitute, her daughter, and a pimp enter his life.
title: It's Not Good for a Man to Be Alone
